circumstances: Three minutes after takeoff from Filonovskaya (Novoanninski district of the Volgograd region), while on a crop spraying flight for the kolkhoz (collective farm) "Pobeda" with an unauthorized passenger on board, the intoxicated pilot lost control of the aircraft that lost height and crashed upside down in a field some 3 km from the airstrip. Both pilot and passenger were killed. At the time of the accident, the pilot had a alcohol level of 1,1‰  in blood.
